room_title: Escape room "Dragon's Curse" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had an awesome time at the Plano location. We were a group of 7... adults and kids included. It was the first time for most of us and all of us had a great time. The staff was amazing specially Crystal. Definitely a place we will keep going back to!

room_title: Escape room "Dragon's Curse" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Thank you for having us tonight! My 7 friends and I successfully escaped from your dragon-themed room and had a blast with your team member Sam hosting us! Thanks Sam! This was my birthday wish, and for many of us, this was our first escape room, and it was a perfect challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Dragon's Curse" by North Texas Escape Rooms in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I’ve been looking for an escape room for younger kids since most of them are for 14 and up. We had an awesome time with an 11 and 9 year old in the Dragon’s Curse room (plano location. Jake was our game master and was very helpful when we needed it! Definitely recommend for families and kids!
